title: Department of Biotechnology
bannerCon: Promoting academic excellence and research in biotechnology to address global health and environmental challenges.

items.subTitle: Overview
items.contents: The Department of Biotechnology was established in the year 2013. It offers B.Tech Biotechnology programme to provide quality education, training and research in Biotechnology. The Department has well qualified and experienced faculty members as its significant strength who constantly motivates, inspires and guides the students for their personal growth and to become technically competent. The Department is booming with all the essential facilities and infrastructure to cater the needs of the students and the society. The research specialization of the department includes drug discovery and is constantly striving for the industrial collaboration for downstream processing of bio-based products.

items.subTitle: Vision
content: To produce competent biotechnologists through quality education and promote scientific research for the benefit of society and the environment.

items.subTitle: Mission
content: To educate students to acquire strong knowledge and skills in Biotechnology.
To create opportunities for multi-disciplinary education and research in Biotechnology.
To nurture students to carryout scientific projects to find solutions for global societal problems.

basic.title: Faculty
basic.description: The faculty of the Engineering Biotechnology program comprises experienced academicians and research-oriented professionals dedicated to excellence in teaching and innovation. They integrate engineering principles with biological sciences to provide strong theoretical foundations and hands-on training, preparing students for careers in biotechnology, healthcare, research, and industry.
